name: The Polly Collection Remastered
description:
Four classic games return in one convenient rar file!  Remastered in HD!  Ok not really I didn't do anything, but since they're exe files now you can just full screen them!

Original release date: April 1st 2008.

Made for an April Fools' Day website, Polly has been trapped in a massive maze that will take about 5 minutes to complete and is being taunted by a mysterious voice that definitely isn't a parody of Portal.

This was a very very early engine test of another game, Hunters, that would come out 3 years later.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to do things.

Original release date: September 19th 2009

Polly gets the best birthday present ever!  You'll NEVER guess what it was!

Another adaptation of the scrolling areas I was working on in Hunters Stage 3, with a simple original boss at the end.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, X to jump, Z to attack.

Original release date: September 19th 2013

Move over Divekick! Your fighting game uses two buttons?  Well DoofKick uses only one, AND has Polly as a (the only) playable character!

A very very simple parody game, featuring professional voice acting.  This part isn't a joke!

Controls: Spacebar.

Original release date: September 19th 2015

Real time action RPG where Polly fights through ONE HUNDRED waves of various copyright infringing foes!  Click your way to victory as you collect Polly Points, level up  STRANTH, and raise your HP after taking fatal damage to stay alive.

If you play one game here, it should be this one.

Controls: Click!

Bonus thing: Polly Maker

The tool used to generate random Pollys in Polly Dungeon.  I don't think I ever actually released it til now!
